title: Amorepacific sees sharp plunge in sales
dc:creator: Retail Asia
description:

South Korean beauty conglomerate Amorepacific has recorded a 15.6 percent year-on-year drop in sales for its third quarter of this year, with operating profit plummeting 62.6 percent to US$13.2 million.
